short.zh_TW: 最佳螢幕截圖Chrome擴展，完整網頁螢幕截圖捕獲。完整地捕獲當前網頁的螢幕截圖。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en_AU,en_GB,e:
A full-page web screenshot extension developed with the latest technology, fully compliant with the latest Chrome extension manifest V3, which means better privacy protection, more power saving and no additional permissions required at all.

It's the easiest method for taking a full-page screenshot of the current browser window. Click the extension icon and start (or press Alt+Shift+X), the browser will then automatically scroll and capture each area of the page. You'll be sent to a new tab with your screenshot, where you may save it as an image or PDF, you are then able to print directly, insert into email, upload to a network drive or whatever you want to do.

For extremely long web pages, this extension can also capture the full page completely in seconds.
long.en:
A full-page web screenshot extension developed with the latest technology, fully compliant with the latest browser extension manifest, which means better privacy protection, more power saving and no additional permissions required at all.

It's the easiest method for taking a full-page screenshot of the current browser window. Click the extension icon and start (or press Alt+Shift+X), the browser will then automatically scroll and capture each area of the page. You'll be sent to a new tab with your screenshot, where you may save it as an image or PDF, you are then able to print directly, insert into email, upload to a network drive or whatever you want to do.

It can also take screenshots of the desktop screen.

It is also possible to save complete web pages with hyperlinks for sharing.

For extremely long web pages, this extension can also capture the full page completely in seconds.

It also comes with a image editor that can

Crop
Flip
Rotation
Resize
Free drawing
Line drawing
Shape
Icon
Text
Mask Filter
Image Filter

your screenshot.
long.zh_CN:
采用最新技术开发的整页网页截图扩展，完全兼容最新的浏览器，完全不需要额外的权限，更好的隐私保护，更省电。

对网页进行全页截图的最简单方法。单击扩展图标并开始（或按 Alt+Shift+X），浏览器将自动滚动并捕获页面的每个区域。随后会打开一个带有屏幕截图的新选项卡，您可以在其中将其保存为图像或 PDF，然后您可以直接打印、插入电子邮件、上传到网盘或任何其他您想做的事情。

它还可以截取整个桌面屏幕的截图。

还可以保存带有超链接的完整网页以供共享。

对于极长的网页，这个扩展也可以在几秒钟内完全捕获整个页面。

它还带有一个图像编辑器，可以进行

截取
翻转
调整大小
自由绘图
画线
添加形状
添加图标
添加文本
添加滤镜
添加蒙版
添加水印

等常规图片操作。
long.zh_TW:
採用最新技術開發的整頁網頁截圖擴展，完全相容最新的瀏覽器，完全不需要額外的權限，更好的隱私保護，更省電。

對網頁進行全頁截圖的最簡單方法。單擊擴展圖示並開始（或按 Alt+Shift+X），瀏覽器將自動滾動並捕獲頁面的每個區域。隨後會打開一個帶有螢幕截圖的新選項卡，您可以在其中將其保存為圖像或 PDF，然後您可以直接列印、插入電子郵件、上傳到網路硬碟或任何其他您想做的事情。

它還可以截取整個桌面螢幕的截圖。

還可以保存帶有超連結的完整網頁以供共享。

對於極長的網頁，這個擴展也可以在幾秒鐘內完全捕獲整個頁面。

它還帶有一個圖像編輯器，可以進行

截取
翻轉
調整大小
自由繪圖
畫線
添加形狀
添加圖示
添加文本
添加濾鏡
添加遮色片
添加浮水印

等常規圖片操作。
